Name: Hoplichess
About the game: Lead your very own Greek forces to victory in this simple but endearing game of ingenuity and tactics. Master the command of your troops, dominate the field, and prove your mettle as a general. -Tactical base building: Choose which buildings to use in filling up your limited slots. Make a wrong turn and you'll find you can't defend yourself! -Construct your army: Use a diverse array of units, including archers, hoplites, cavalry, catapults and battering rams! -Tight resource management: You can't afford to spend foolishly when engaged in combat! -Challenging AI: Sure to offer resistance to even the toughest players
